info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:23PM EDT until July 15 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL PORTAGE...SOUTHEASTERN CUYAHOGA AND NORTHERN SUMMIT COUNTIES... At 322 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of North Royalton, or 13 miles northwest of Akron, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Akron, Cuyahoga Falls, Hudson, Twinsburg, Streetsboro, Macedonia, Stow, Garfield Heights, Maple Heights, Broadview Heights, Aurora, Brecksville, Bedford, Fairlawn, Independence, Northfield, Richfield, Silver Lake, Walton Hills and Valley View. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
